text: Is there limitations as to what packages you can install for a server in a CRM Card? In local dev everything works fine but once I deploy it , I get a issue about not finding a module (guessing its not installing?)
figured ito ut - package had to be in the package.json within the app.functions folder
If I want to order a hubdb table by date and for rows not containing a date by name, how would I go about doing that?
